sentences.en: a young boxer who's just turned pro
sentences.cn: 刚转为职业选手的年轻拳击手

sentences.en: As the referee counted, the boxer rallied and got to his feet.
sentences.cn: 裁判在数点的时候, 那位拳击手恢复了体力,站了起来.

sentences.en: He moved lightly on his toes like a boxer.
sentences.cn: 他像拳击手一样踮着脚轻盈移动.

sentences.en: He moved with the grace of a trained boxer.
sentences.cn: 他的动作带着一种训练有素的拳击手的风采。

sentences.en: He was the best boxer in the tournament.
sentences.cn: 他是本届联赛的最佳拳手.

sentences.en: He was wearing a blue silk singlet and boxer shorts.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件蓝色丝绸背心和平脚短裤。

sentences.en: The blow hit the boxer and he curled up on the floor.
sentences.cn: 一拳击中了拳击运动员，他被击倒在拳台上。

sentences.en: The boxer fouled his opponent by hitting him below the belt.
sentences.cn: 那个拳击手因击打对手腰部以下而犯规.

sentences.en: The boxer gave his opponent a punch on the nose.
sentences.cn: 这个拳击手朝他对手的鼻子上猛击一拳.

sentences.en: The boxer is hitting with his right arm, guarding with his left.
sentences.cn: 这个拳击手是用右手出击, 左手防护.

sentences.en: The boxer is out of training.
sentences.cn: 那位拳击手体能状况不佳.

sentences.en: The boxer punched his opponent on the nose.
sentences.cn: 拳击运动员朝对手的鼻子猛击。

sentences.en: The boxer saw his chance and struck out at his opponent's jaw.
sentences.cn: 那位拳击手看准了机会,猛击对手的下颚.

sentences.en: The boxer took up a fighting stance.
The promoter matched the young boxer with a more skillful fighter.
sentences.cn: 拳击竞赛主办者让这位年轻拳击手和技术更娴熟的拳师较量.

sentences.en: The young boxer has copped the prize of the first round.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的拳击手已获得了第一回合的胜利。

sentences.en: There was so much blood it had soaked through my boxer shorts.
sentences.cn: 血流得太多，渗透了我的平脚短裤。

sentences.en: This boxer outweighed by his opponent 20 pounds.
sentences.cn: 这个拳击选手体重比他的对手重20磅.
